title: Quiz 2: Feb 2022 Theory FQE
topicName: Computer Application in Health Care Collection
description: February 2022 Final Qualifying Examination Theory Paper for Computer Application in Health Care.

questions.question: In Ms Access, how can you create relationship between two tables in the GUI?

options.text: Drag the foreign key of a table into the primary key of another table
Drag any field from parent table and drop on child table
Drag the primary key of a table into foreign key of another table
Any of these can be done to create relationship

questions.explanation: The standard method is dragging the unique identifier (Primary Key) from the parent table to the reference field (Foreign Key) in the child table.

questions.question: The small button with three dots displayed at the right of field properties box is called:
questions.explanation: This button launches builders like the Expression Builder or Input Mask Wizard.

questions.question: The main center of access file that appears when we create or open the Ms Access database file (in older versions):
questions.explanation: In older Access versions, this was the central container. In newer versions, it's the Navigation Pane.
questions.hint: The window that holds the whole database.

questions.question: How can you define a field so that when entering data, #### is displayed?
questions.explanation: Setting the Input Mask property to 'Password' causes characters to be displayed as asterisks or hash marks to mask the input.

questions.question: In which method we don't need to specify the field type while creating a new table?
questions.explanation: When entering data in Datasheet View, Access automatically assigns data types based on the value entered.

questions.question: What does the show check box in query design window indicate?

options.text: It indicates whether the field is to be used or not
It indicates whether the field is to be displayed in query result or not
It indicates whether the field name is to be displayed in query result or not
It indicated whether the field s to be used for grouping results or not

questions.explanation: Unchecking it allows you to use the field for criteria without showing it in the final datasheet.
questions.hint: To show or not to show.

questions.question: Which of the following option creates a Drop Down list of values?
questions.explanation: Lookup Wizard creates a field that allows you to choose a value from another table or from a list of values.

questions.question: Which kind of query displays its own dialogue box prompting you for entering information before executing?
questions.explanation: A Parameter query asks for input criteria (like a date or name) via a dialog box when run.

questions.question: Which operator is used to filter and display rows when all (two or more) conditions are Satisfied?
questions.explanation: The AND operator requires all conditions to be true.

questions.question: The upper part of the query design window in Ms Access shows:
questions.explanation: The upper pane shows the Tables (lists of field names) and the relationship lines between them.

questions.question: Which feature is used to duplicate a control formatting? (Enter the tool name)
questions.explanation: The Format Painter tool copies formatting from one object and applies it to another.

questions.question: Database locking refers to?

options.text: Preventing two individual from changing the same data at the same time
Using a password to prevent unauthorized access
Preventing accidents delete by using password lock
Ensuring data is not lost before exiting database

questions.explanation: Locking manages concurrency to prevent data corruption when multiple users edit simultaneously.

questions.question: How do you make data field DOB to store the dates like '2002/10/15'?

options.text: By entering dates in yyyy, mm, dd order
By setting the format property to 'yyyy/mm/dd'
By setting the input mask property to 'yyyy/mm/dd'
By allowing access to pick date from calendar option

questions.explanation: Input Mask controls how data is entered and stored. Format property controls how it is displayed.

questions.question: Which of the following data type is more commonly called Boolean?
questions.explanation: Boolean logic deals with two states: True/False, Yes/No, On/Off.

questions.question: Which linking code can be used to link a web page to kmtc.ac.ke?
questions.explanation: The anchor tag <a> with the href attribute is used for hyperlinks.

questions.question: Step by step instructions written to solve any problem is called:
questions.explanation: An algorithm is a finite sequence of well-defined instructions.

questions.question: DHCP severs provides --- to the client?
questions.explanation: Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) assigns IP addresses to clients automatically.

questions.question: Which one of the following is a html tag?
questions.explanation: is the tag for a line break.

questions.question: Which attribute in html language is used to embed an image in a HTML page?
questions.explanation: The tag is used to embed images.

questions.question: What feature will one use to apply motion effects in between a slide exits and another enters?
questions.explanation: Transitions occur between slides; Animations occur on objects within a slide.

questions.question: A set of rules that govern all aspects of information communication is called:
questions.explanation: Protocols are the rules (like grammar) for communication.

questions.question: Computer memory is measured in terms of:
questions.explanation: While bits are the smallest unit, memory capacity is generally quoted in Bytes (and its multiples).

questions.question: What type of chart is useful in comparing values over categories?
questions.explanation: Column/Bar charts are best for comparing quantities across categories.

questions.question: A feature in Excel that displays only the data in column(s) according to specific criteria:
questions.explanation: Filtering hides rows that do not meet the criteria.

questions.question: The greater than sign ( > ) is an example of which operator?
questions.explanation: It returns a TRUE/FALSE value, used for comparison logic.

questions.question: An Excel file is generally called a/an:
questions.explanation: The file is a Workbook; it contains Worksheets.

questions.question: When a row of data is to be converted into columns, which Paste Special feature is used?
questions.explanation: Transpose switches rows to columns and vice versa.

questions.question: Which bar shows the used formulas of selected active cells?
questions.explanation: The Formula Bar displays the content or equation of the active cell.

questions.question: ____ is the process of finding errors and fixing them within a program.
questions.explanation: Debugging involves identifying and removing bugs (errors).
